column5: Are you fascinated by the dynamics of modern economies where entire new industries are being created and existing ones constantly require renewal or are made obsolete? Do you want to understand the role of companies such as Google, Tesla and Uber for such industry dynamics? Do you want to research and stimulate these dynamic processes and contribute to policy formulation? Do you want to be part of business start-ups or help companies anticipate, thrive, and innovate?
column7: Tuition fees (2023-2024)  €2.314 (Statutory fee: Dutch / EEA students) €12.600 (Institutional fee: Dutch / EEA students) €16.100 (Institutional fee: non-EEA students)
